vector - generic vector class¶

class pymt.vector.Vector(x=0.0, y=0.0)¶

Represents a 2D vector.

angle¶
Computes the angle between a and b
distance¶
Returns the distance between two points
distanceSqrd¶
Returns the distance between two points squared. Marginally faster than Distance()
dot¶
Computes the dot product of a and b
length¶
Returns the length of a vector
lengthSqrd¶
Returns the length of a vector sqaured. Faster than Length(), but only marginally
normalize¶
Returns a new vector that has the same direction as vec, but has a length of one.
normalized¶
Returns the length of a vector
x¶
y¶
